charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) and 960(b)(1)(A); 18:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-IMPORTATION/EXPORTATION-did knowingly import heroin, a Sch. I narcotic drug controlled substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The deft is committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of Seventy-Two (72) Months. Upon release from imprisonment, the deft shall be on supervised release for a term of Ten (10) years. Special Condition: The deft shall successfully complete a drug treatment program under the supervision of the Probation Dept. The Dept shall maintain full-time employment, enroll full-time in school or a combination thereof. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(i); 18:3551 et seq. NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-did knowingly distribute heroin, a Sch. I narcotic drug controlled substance. (2)

21:952(a) and 960-DEFENDANT DID KNOWINGLY, INTENTIONALLY AND UNLAWFULLY IMPORT INTO THE UNITED STATES FROM A PLACE OUTSIDE THEREOF A SUBSTANCE CONTAINING HEROIN, SCHEDULE I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. [1:93-m-1082]
